title: Return to Its Master (1R224)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring at the end of a skirmish phase, cancel all remaining assignments and assign a Nazgul to skirmish the Ring-bearer; The One Ring's game text does not apply during this skirmish.
Lore:	”'The Riders made straight for you….”'
Rarity:	R
Notes:	This card creates a skirmish in addition to regular and fierce skirmishes.
